terms:
Extra Value Gift Card

Terms and Conditions:

  • Valid Mon - Sun 11:00am - 10.30pm.
  • Valid for dine-in only for lunch and dinner.
  • Minimum 2 vouchers purchased (2 people) to dine-in.
  • Set will be combined and served on a single plate.
  • Additional $2 per person for Friday - Sunday, eve of public holidays, public holidays and special occasions.
  • Not valid for other discounts or promotions.
  • Voucher is non-cancellable.
